metadata.title: shop4ever California Beach Palm Tree T-Shirt Cali Flag Shirts
features: ORIGINAL DESIGN. Official Shop4Ever brand. We create unique, thoughtful designs for everyday casual wear, special occasions, and holidays. Proudly designed and printed in the United States.

QUALITY FIT. Comfortable, lightweight fit tee, solid colors are 100% cotton material, heather colors are 50/50 cotton poly blend, sports grey is 90/10 cotton poly blend. Machine wash inside out with cold water, tumble dry low. Design print may appear smaller on larger sizes.

GREAT FOR CALIFORNIA NATIVES. Excellent gift for a proud California born Native. Represent that Cali life living the California dream, SoCal or NorCal. Perfect apparel to wear to the beach, hiking at the mountains, or any theme park to show off your Cali Pride.

PERFECT SOUVENIR! Great souvenir for tourists visting the beautiful Golden State. On the West Coast from Los Angeles, San Diego, San Francisco, San Jose, Sacramento, Berkeley, Santa Cruz, NorCal, and SoCal.

MORE CHOICES FOR YOU. Visit our Shop4Ever store for our a wide selection of California and beach apparel for mom, dad, wife husband, boyfriend, girlfriend, grandpa, grandma, sister, brother, daughter, son and yourself. We also have more novelty gifts available, like coffee mugs, wine glasses, tote bags and aprons.
description: Exclusive Shop4Ever brand novelty shirts made with a cotton blend. These sweatshirts are printed exclusively in the United States. Recommended to wash in cold water, inside out. Many of our designs are available in hoodies, crewnecks, men’s, women’s, and youth sizes and come in a variety of different colors. Check our store to see them all!
